short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prints to the console all cookie setting actions to allow the debugger to check if a certain cookie is being changed/deleted!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily track cookie sets or expirations whilst navigating throuhgout a website.
It prints on the console a "green" label when a cookie value is set, and a "red" label when a cookie changes the expiration date.
Add cookie names to the filter list to track and print to the console only the intended cookies.
